name: CRYPT15 File
summary: Learn about .CRYPT15 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can decrypt a CRYPT15 database with WhatsApp Crypt Tools (Windows), but you must provide the key file or 64-digit key. You can find your WhatsApp key file, which stores your CRYPT15 file's encryption key, in the following location:

You can also migrate or restore your WhatsApp message history on an Android device with a CRYPT15 file. To do so, you must rename your most recent CRYPT15 file to msgstore.db.crypt15, uninstall and reinstall WhatsApp, and then tap RESTORE in the app when prompted.
